summary: A young shut-in takes an imaginary road trip inside his apartment, based on mementos and memories of a European trek from years before.
cast: Edward Hogg|Simon Farnaby|Verónica Echegui|Richard Ayoade|Julian Barratt|Noel Fielding|Sylvia Syms|James Fox|Rich Fulcher|Gus Brown|Madeleine Worrall|Stephen Foster-Hunt|Waleed Khalid|George Newton|Margaret Wheldon
title: Bunny and the Bull
